name: めぐる
text: でき、た……？　できたー！！
trans: Did we do it...? Yeah, we did it!!

name: 真乃
text: ほわっ、めぐるちゃん……！
trans: Howa, Meguru-chan...!

name: 灯織
text:
く、苦しいって、めぐる
いきなり抱きつかないで……！
trans:
That's too tight, Meguru!
Don't hug me all of a sudden...!

name: めぐる
text:
わたしたち、今完璧だった！　完璧だったよね！？
ちゃんと揃ってたよね！？
trans:
We were perfect just now! Weren't we perfect!?
We matched each other perfectly, right!?

name: 灯織
text: 落ち着いて、大丈夫だから
trans: Calm down, it's alright.

name: 真乃
text:
本当に……私、上手くできてたかな……？
みんなに教えてもらったこと、ちゃんと守れてたかな……？
trans:
Did I... really do it well...?
All the things you taught me, did I do them right...?

name: 灯織
text:
みんな、できてたよ。ちゃんと揃ってた
今までの練習で、1番上手くいってたと思う
trans:
Yeah, we all did it. We matched each other.
I think this is the best run we've had so far.

name: 灯織
text:
真乃も、すごく堂々としてた
ターンも綺麗だったし、ちゃんと前も見れてたし──
trans:
Mano, you did it so confidently too. Your turn was
graceful, and you kept your gaze forward the
whole time.

name: 灯織
text: ──鳥が、空を飛んでるみたいだった
trans: ─Just like a bird flying in the sky.

name: 真乃
text: ほわぁ……！
trans: Howah...!

name: めぐる
text: さっすがわたしたちの真乃！
trans: That's our Mano!

name: 灯織
text: ……やったね、真乃
trans: ...You did it, Mano.

name: 真乃
text:
うんっ……！
ふたりが一緒に頑張ってくれたからだよっ
trans:
Yeah...! It's all because you two were here with me
the whole time!

name: 真乃
text: ふたりのおかげだよ、灯織ちゃん、めぐるちゃん──！
trans: It's all thanks to you, Hiori-chan, Meguru-chan─!

name: めぐる
text: はいっ、これが真乃と灯織の分のジュース！
trans: Here, Mano, Hiori, have some juice!

name: 真乃
text:
ごめんね、めぐるちゃん
買ってきてくれてありがとう
trans:
Sorry for the trouble, Meguru-chan.
Thank you for buying it for us.

name: 灯織
text: ありがとう、めぐる
trans: Thank you, Meguru.

name: めぐる
text: ううん、どういたしまして！
trans: Nah, you're welcome.

name: めぐる
text:
んく、んく……んー！　今日のジュースは美味しいなぁ！
勝利の祝杯の味、って感じ？
trans:
Glug, glug... Mmm! This juice tastes really good today!
It tastes like victory, y'know?

name: 灯織
text: まだ何も勝ってないでしょ
trans: We haven't won anything yet, you know.

name: めぐる
text:
いやいや、勝ってるんだよ！
たとえばほら──昨日のわたしたちとかにはさ！
trans:
No way, we did win a victory today! Like, for
example─ over our past selves from yesterday!

name: 真乃
text:
そっかぁ、ほんとだね。私たち、昨日より……
ちょっとかもしれないけど、成長してる、もんね……！
trans:
I see, that's true. We've grown since yesterday...
Just a little bit, but we've grown, right...!

name: 灯織
text: それじゃあ、毎日お祝いのジュースが必要になりそう
trans:
If that's the case, we'll have to toast our victory
like this every single day.

name: めぐる
text:
おおっ、灯織もちゃんと毎日成長してるって
実感してるんだ！
trans:
Ooh, Hiori, so you feel that we're growing every day,
too!

name: 灯織
text: あ、今のは──そういう気持ちでやらなきゃって話で……！
trans:
Ah, that was─ I mean we'll have to keep going with
that kind of determination...!

name: めぐる
text:
うんうんっ！　これからも1歩ずつ、
みんなで一緒に頑張っていこうね！
trans:
Yeah, yeah! From here on out, let's keep
doing our best together each step of the way!

name: 灯織
text: ……もう
trans: ...Geez.

name: 真乃
text:
……でも、めぐるちゃんの言う通りだよ
私たちみんなで、進んでいかなくちゃ
trans:
...But, it's just as Meguru said.
We've got to keep moving forward together.

name: 真乃
text:
プロデューサーさんもはづきさんも、
さっき、すごく喜んでくれてたし……
trans:
Producer-san and Hazuki-san were so happy with us
just now...

name: めぐる
text:
そうそう！
この調子だって、すっごく応援してくれたよねっ
trans:
That's right!
They've always been cheering us on like that.

name: 灯織
text:
そうだね……応援してくれる人、支えてくれる人のためにも
いいステージを見せられるアイドルにならないと
trans:
That's true... We need to become idols who can 
put on a good show, for the sake of the people 
who have supported and cheered us on, too.

name: 灯織
text:
自分たちの力だけじゃ、ここまで来られなかったんだから
……恩返し、しなくちゃ
trans:
We couldn't have come this far with just our own
effort... We've got to return the favor.

name: めぐる
text:
わたしたちのステージで、みんな笑顔になってくれたら……
恩返しになるかな？
trans:
If we can make everyone smile through our
performance... Would that be giving back to them?

name: 灯織
text: ──ステージで恩返しをするのがアイドルの仕事でしょ？
trans:
─Returning their kindness through our performance
is an idol's job, right?

name: 灯織
text: だから、これからもレッスンを頑張ろう
trans:
So let's keep working hard at our lessons
going forward.

name: 灯織
text:
それで結果を出して、
さすが２８３プロのアイドルだって、言われたい
trans:
I want to show everyone the results of our work,
and have them say "As expected of 283Pro's idols."

name: 真乃＆めぐる
text: うん！
trans: Yeah!

name: 真乃
text: ……あの、灯織ちゃん、めぐるちゃん
trans: ...Hey, Hiori-chan, Meguru-chan.

name: 真乃
text: 私たち、ユニットを組んだばっかりで……
trans: We've just become a unit, and...

name: 真乃
text:
デビューライブだってまだだし、
『W.I.N.G.』なんて、遠い未来の話みたいに思えちゃうけど
trans:
We haven't even had our debut show, and 
W.I.N.G. still seems so far off in the future, but...

name: 真乃
text: これからも……３人なら、上手くできるよね？
trans:
Do you think... the three of us can do well... from
now on?

name: めぐる
text:
もちろん！　大丈夫だよ！
一緒ならなんだってできちゃうって、わたしは思うな！
trans:
Of course! We'll be just fine! I think that as long as
we're together, we can do anything!

name: 灯織
text: ちょっと。油断大敵、でしょ
trans: Hold on. We shouldn't get overconfident, you know.

name: 灯織
text:
……でも、私もめぐるの意見に賛成
３人一緒なら、きっと……どこまででもいけると思う
trans:
...That aside, I agree with Meguru. With the three 
of us together, I'm sure... we can go anywhere.

name: 灯織
text: だって、私たちが目指してるのは──
trans: After all, right now our goal is─

name: 一同
trans: W.I.N.G.!

name: 一同
text: ふふっ
trans: Heehee.

name: めぐる
text: 今の感じ、優勝も狙えちゃうんじゃない？
trans:
Don't you think we can just grab that victory title
right now?

name: 灯織
text:
やるからには当然だけど……
さっきも言ったでしょ、油断大敵
trans:
We'll definitely do it, but...
Like I said, we can't get overconfident.

name: めぐる
text: 油断じゃないよー、自信だよー
trans: It's not overconfidence, it's self‐assurance!

name: 灯織
text:
またそうやって
すぐ調子に乗るの、めぐるの悪い癖だよ
trans:
There you go getting carried away again.
That's a bad habit of yours, Meguru.

name: めぐる
text: 何を～！？　灯織は慎重すぎるんだからねっ
trans:
What'd you say～!? Hiori, you're always way too
cautious!

name: 灯織
text: 慎重なのは悪いことじゃないから
trans: But being cautious isn't a bad thing.

name: めぐる
text: たまには瞬発力だって必要になるもん
trans:
Sometimes you gotta take instant action too,
you know!

name: 真乃
text: まぁまぁ、ふたりともっ
trans: Now, now, you two.

name: 灯織＆めぐる
text: 真乃はどう思う？
trans: What do you think, Mano?

name: 真乃
text: ほわっ……！？
trans: Howa...!?

name: 真乃
text:
……え、えっと……灯織ちゃんもめぐるちゃんも、
お互いのことをよく見てるんだなって……
trans:
...Ah, umm... Hiori-chan, Meguru-chan,
both of you really pay attention to each other and...

name: 真乃
text: ……イルミネーションスターズは
trans: ...illumination STARS is...

name: 真乃
text:
お互いに大好きって思ったメンバーが
集まったユニットなんだなって……そう思う、かな
trans:
A unit full of members that really like and care 
about each other... is what I think.

name: 真乃
text: （だから……この３人で、どこまでも羽ばたきたい）
trans:
(That's why... I want the three of us to fly as far as
we can.)

name: 真乃
text:
（デビューライブも、『W.I.N.G.』も、
その先にだって──ずっと、ずっと！）
trans:
(For our debut show, and W.I.N.G. too,
and even beyond that─ forever and ever!)
